Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetTitle
Action.Description: Get the title of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetPosition
Action.Description: Get the web browser window position.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetSize
Action.Description: Get the web browser window size.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetWindowState
Action.Description: Get the web browser window state.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetWindowStyle
Action.Description: Get the web browser window style.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetReadyState
Action.Description: Returns the web browser window current state. The current state can be one of the following values: Complete, Interactive, Loaded, Loading, Uninitialized.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetNavigationStatus
Action.Description: Returns the web browser window navigation status. The navigation status can be one of the following values: Uninitialized, Navigating, Navigated, PageLoaded.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetHtmlContent
Action.Description: Returns the html contents of the page displayed in the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetTextContent
Action.Description: Returns the text contents of the page displayed in the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetUrl
Action.Description: Returns the url of the page displayed in the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetOpacity
Action.Description: Returns the opacity (transparency) of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetIcon
Action.Description: Returns the iconfile of the web browser window that was previosly set with WebBrowserWindow.SetIcon.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.GetError
Action.Description: Returns the error if any occur.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetTitle
Action.Description: Set the title of the web browser window.

Arg.Name: Title
Arg.Description: Title of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetPosition
Action.Description: Set the web browser window position.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetSize
Action.Description: Set the web browser window size.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetWindowState
Action.Description: Set the web browser window state.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetWindowStyle
Action.Description: Set the web browser window style.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetHtmlContent
Action.Description: Set the html content of the page displayed int web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetTextContent
Action.Description: Set the text content of the page displayed int web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetUrl
Action.Description: Set the url of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetOpacity
Action.Description: Set the opacity (transparency) of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SetIcon
Action.Description: Set the icon of the web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Show
Action.Description: Show web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.ShowDialog
Action.Description: Show web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Hide
Action.Description: Hide web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Close
Action.Description: Close web browser window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Navigate
Action.Description: Navigate the web browser window at the specified url.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Back
Action.Description: Navigates the web browser window to the previous page in the navigation history, if one is available.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Forward
Action.Description: Navigates the web browser window to the next page in the navigation history, if one is available.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Home
Action.Description: Navigates the web browser window to the home page of the current user.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Search
Action.Description: Navigates the web browser window to the default search page of the current user.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Stop
Action.Description: Cancels any pending navigation and stops any dynamic page elements, such as background sounds and animations.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Print
Action.Description: Prints the document currently displayed in the web browser window using the current print and page settings.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.Refresh
Action.Description: Reloads the document currently displayed in the web browser window by checking the server for an updated version.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.PageSetupDialog
Action.Description: Opens the Internet Explorer Page Setup dialog box.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.PrintPreviewDialog
Action.Description: Opens the Internet Explorer Print Preview dialog box.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.PrintDialog
Action.Description: Opens the Internet Explorer Print dialog box.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.PropertiesDialog
Action.Description: Opens the Internet Explorer Properties dialog box for the current document.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.SaveAsDialog
Action.Description: Opens the Internet Explorer Save Web Page dialog box or the Save dialog box of the hosted document if it is not an HTML page.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableNavigation
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window navigation.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable web browser window navigation.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableDrop
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window navigation to documents that are dropped onto it.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable drop.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableContextMenu
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window context menu.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable context menu.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableScrollBars
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window scroll bars.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable scroll bars.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableShortcuts
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window keyboard shortcuts.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable keyboard shortcuts.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableScriptErrors
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window to show error dialogs for scripts errors.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable error dialogs for scripts errors.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnablePopupWindow
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window to show popup windows. Default is false.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable popup windows.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.EnableLoadPopupInMainWindow
Action.Description: Enable or disable web browser window to load popup windows in main window. Default is false.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether to enable or disable the loading of popup windows in main window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsNavigationEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window navigation is enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsDropEnabled
Action.Description: Returns a value whether document drop is enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsContextMenuEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window context menu is enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsScrollBarsEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window scroll bars are enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsShortcutsEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window keyboards are enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsScriptErrorsEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window error dialogs for script errors are enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsPopupWindowEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether popup windows are enabled.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsLoadPopupInMainWindowEnabled
Action.Description: Returns an value whether popup windows can load in the main window.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsBusy
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window is busy.

Action.Name: WebBrowserWindow.IsOffline
Action.Description: Returns an value whether web browser window is in offline mode.
